member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.ArithmeticCarouselCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The arithmetic operations are the most rudimentary operations that I perform. To be precise, I can calculate: the sum; the difference; the product; the quotient; and the remainder for a list of numbers. I also will throw up errors if I need to..

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.ArithmeticCarouselCardTitleText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Arithmetic.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.CannotPickUpCommandText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I'm not able to decipher any input commands here!.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.CurrentMethodBeingImplementedMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This current method is being implemented, I cannot return any results right now!.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.GeometricCarouselCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I can also perform some geometric operations such as: calculating the discriminant; calculating the roots of a quadratic equation; calculating the hypotenuse given two legs of a triangle; calculating the area and perimeter of polygons; and more....

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.GeometricCarouselCardTitleText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Geometric.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.MembersBeingAddedMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Members being added.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.StatisticalCarouselCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The statistical operations that I can do include, but are not limited to: the average; the median; the mode; the range; and other operations. The only way to find out whether or not I calculate a specific metric is to actually send me a command. As an example: mean 1,2,3 and I would return the result of 2.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.StatisticalCarouselCardTitleText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Statistical.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.TakeATourText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Take a tour.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.WelcomeCardBulletListItem1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to * Arithmetic.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.WelcomeCardBulletListItem2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to * Geometric.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.WelcomeCardBulletListItem3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to * Statistical.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.WelcomeCardContentPart1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I am the new and improved {0} - unlike my cousin in v3, I can work a little better. Yes I can do everything my cousin can, and possibly a little more...in due ⏰.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.WelcomeCardContentPart2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Curious are we? Here are the categories of operations that I can do:.

member.name: P:CalculatorChatBot.Properties.Resources.WelcomeCardTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello 👋.
